Description:
Responsibilities:Handling the design of electrical distribution network components for different types of buildings, previous experience in different types of projects; offices, residential, commercial buildings..etc.
Preparation of Single line diagrams and distribution network strategy.
Preparation of Electrical load Lists & Switchgear/Distribution Board Schedules.
Design of medium voltage networks.
Sizing of main electrical equipment, Cable sizing, breaker sizing, CT sizing, power factor correction, lighting, earthing & lightning system.
Preparation of electrical systems layout drawings - Electrical equipment, interior and exterior lighting, street lighting, small power, cable routing, earthing, lightning protection, motor control centers schedules, experience in Fire Alarm system is preferred.
Assist senior engineers in the technical works of the project.
Communicate efficiently with different stakeholders of the project.
Undertake liaison with system engineers, third parties and specialist system suppliers and incorporate their requirements in the detailed design.
Coordinate with all other disciplines and improve inter-discipline working with other disciplines such as Architecture, civil, structure and mechanical.Skills
Skills:
2 to 5 years of proven experience in a similar role within engineering or consultancy firm.
Have the ability to the well understanding and interpretation of international codes and standards (BS, IEC, IET, NEC, NFPA, CIBSE, IESNA, ISO,..etc)
Familiar with the local country codes of middle east and gulf countries.
Experience in working with Revit, BIM 360, Navisworks, and other BIM tools is a must.
Proficiency in the following software list:
Dialux, Relux and Dialux Evo. ETAP. ProDesign. Generator sizing software. Lightning protection calculation software. (IEC, strikerisk,..etc) MS – office
Bachelor’s degree in electrical engineering from a reputable university with minimum overall grade of “Very Good”.
Experience of working in Multi-D environment and good understanding of co-ordination and interfaces with other disciplines.
Ability to work in multi-cultural multilingual environment.
Open to new ideas and innovative approaches.
Be a competent user of IT tools in particular Word, Excel, Outlook and Electrical design tools e.g. Amtech, dialux etc.;
Proficiency in Revit , BIM 360, AutoCad is a must.
Wider knowledge of other disciplines is desirable;
Responsible for completion of specifically assigned tasks to time and cost.
Able to work as reliable and pro-active member of the team.
Excellent command of English language. (Writing and speaking)
Good communication, presentation and listening skills.
Writing professional reports.
Identifies and communicates concerns to immediate supervisor.
Possess capability to take individual responsibilities.
Willingness to share information and knowledge with team members.
Shows flexibility in work tasks, locations and flexibility to work with teams in a different time zone.
